articles.description: When choosing a phone for gaming, you should consider what types of games you play the most and how you play them.
articles.content: OnePlus 11 5G wasn't built as a gaming phone, but it was built for gamers too. It features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip, similar to the S23 Ultra, it has 8, 12, and 16 GB of RAM with storage options sta… [+890 chars]
